Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends certain provisions authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Weedsport
Summary: Extends certain provisions authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Weedsport to 12/31/2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 308 of the laws of 2023, amending the tax law relating to authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Weedsport, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
